name: Countless Sights to See
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kirara, equip this card.
After Kirara equips this card, immediately use Meow-teor Kick once.
When your Kirara who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kirara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1707]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1707] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S17072]</color> once.
When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1707]</color> who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1707] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kirara</color>, equip this card.
After Kirara equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color> once.
When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kirara</color> who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kirara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Kirara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
